Text.Page:
It's so frustrating.

It's been over a month since I came here but I haven't been able to do anything ever since the trouble took place. And the guild won't let me do anything...It's driving me nuts.
Another day wasted. We're not going to get anything done stuck in the village like this!
This is ridiculous. We have too much to do to be stuck in town.

We came here for treasure! Not to sit and do nothing.

I could do nothing at home, you know.
